summary: Three movie genres of the 1930s, boxing films, World War I aviation dramas, and backstage Broadway musicals, are satirized using the same cast.
cast: George C. Scott|Trish Van Devere|Red Buttons|Eli Wallach|Harry Hamlin|Ann Reinking|Jocelyn Brando|Michael Kidd|Kathleen Beller|Barry Bostwick|Art Carney|Clay Hodges|George P. title: Movie movie
